info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 7:28PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Yuma County through 815 PM MST... At 728 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tyson, or 31 miles northeast of Fortuna Foothills. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dateland, Tacna, Tyson, Mohawk and Roll. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 36 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
